trans-unit.source: You are free to define other testing environment configuration values as necessary. The testing environment variables may be configured in the phpunit.xml file, but make sure to clear your configuration cache using the config:clear Artisan command before running your tests!
trans-unit.target: 您可以根据需要自由定义其他测试环境配置值。该 testing 环境变量可以在配置 phpunit.xml 文件，但一定要明确使用配置缓存 config:clear 运行测试之前，工匠的命令！

trans-unit.source: You are free to extend the PersonalAccessToken model used internally by Sanctum:

trans-unit.target: 您可以自由扩展Passport内部使用的模型。

trans-unit.source: You are free to write your own /login endpoint; however, you should ensure that it authenticates the user using the standard, session based authentication services that Laravel provides.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自由编写自己的 /login 端点；但是，您应确保使用Laravel提供的基于会话的标准身份验证服务对用户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You are not limited to casting values to primitive types. You may also cast values to objects. Defining custom casts that cast values to objects is very similar to casting to primitive types; however, the set method should return an array of key / value pairs that will be used to set raw, storable values on the model.
trans-unit.target: 您不仅限于将值强制转换为基本类型。您也可以将值强制转换为对象。定义将值强制转换为对象的自定义强制转换与强制转换为基本类型非常相似。但是， set 方法应返回键/值对的数组，这些键/值对将用于在模型上设置原始的可存储值。

trans-unit.source: You are not limited to displaying the contents of the variables passed to the view. You may also echo the results of any PHP function. In fact, you can put any PHP code you wish inside of a Blade echo statement:
trans-unit.target: 你并不局限于显示传递给视图的变量的内容,你还可以呼应任何PHP函数的结果。你也可以呼应任何PHP函数的结果。事实上,你可以在Blade echo语句中放入任何你想要的PHP代码。

trans-unit.source: You are not limited to just specifying the "to" recipients when sending a message. You are free to set "to", "cc", and "bcc" recipients all within a single, chained method call:
trans-unit.target: 当你发送消息时,你并不局限于指定 "收件人"。你可以在一个单一的链式方法调用中自由设置 "to"、"cc "和 "bcc "收件人。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to use the authentication scaffolding included with Laravel Jetstream. If you choose to not use this scaffolding, you will need to manage user authentication using the Laravel authentication classes directly. Don't worry, it's a cinch!
trans-unit.target: 你不需要使用Laravel Jetstream中包含的身份验证脚手架,如果你选择不使用这个脚手架,你需要直接使用Laravel身份验证类来管理用户身份验证.如果你选择不使用这个脚手架,你将需要直接使用Laravel认证类来管理用户认证.别担心,这很简单!

trans-unit.source: You can also run a delete statement on a set of models. In this example, we will delete all flights that are marked as inactive. Like mass updates, mass deletes will not fire any model events for the models that are deleted:
trans-unit.target: 您也可以对一组模型运行删除语句。在本例中,我们将删除所有标记为非活动的航班。与大规模更新一样,大规模删除不会为被删除的模型启动任何模型事件。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify subscription item options. For example, you may need to specify the subscription plan quantities:

trans-unit.source: You can write your own Valet "driver" to serve PHP applications running on another framework or CMS that is not natively supported by Valet. trans-unit.source: You do not need to choose between exclusively using gates or exclusively using policies when building an application. Most applications will most likely contain a mixture of gates and policies, and that is perfectly fine! Gates are most applicable to actions which are not related to any model or resource, such as viewing an administrator dashboard. In contrast, policies should be used when you wish to authorize an action for a particular model or resource.
trans-unit.target: 在构建应用程序时,您不需要在完全使用门或完全使用策略之间做出选择。大多数应用程序很可能包含门和策略的混合,这完全没有问题!门最适用于与任何模型或资源无关的操作,例如查看管理员仪表板。门最适用于与任何模型或资源无关的操作,例如查看管理员仪表板。相比之下,当您希望授权某个特定模型或资源的操作时,应该使用策略。

trans-unit.source: You may choose to define how many trial days your plan's receive in the Paddle dashboard or always pass them explicitly using Cashier. trans-unit.source: You may use the where method on a query builder instance to add where clauses to the query. The most basic call to where requires three arguments. The first argument is the name of the column. The second argument is an operator, which can be any of the database's supported operators. Finally, the third argument is the value to evaluate against the column.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在查询生成器实例上使用 where 方法将 where 子句添加到查询中。对 where 的最基本调用需要三个参数。第一个参数是列的名称。第二个参数是一个运算符，可以是数据库支持的任何运算符。最后，第三个参数是要对该列求值的值。

trans-unit.source: You may use the withBody method if you would like to provide a raw request body when making a request:

trans-unit.target: 您可以在请求之前使用 withCookie 或 withCookies 方法设置cookie值。该 withCookie 方法接受cookie的名称和值作为它的两个参数，而 withCookies 方法接受的名称/值对的数组：

trans-unit.source: You may use the withHeaders method to customize the request's headers before it is sent to the application. This allows you to add any custom headers you would like to the request:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 withHeaders 方法自定义请求的标头，然后再将其发送到应用程序。这使您可以将任何想要的自定义标头添加到请求中：

trans-unit.source: You may want to publish groups of package assets and resources separately. For instance, you might want to allow your users to publish your package's configuration files without being forced to publish your package's assets. You may do this by "tagging" them when calling the publishes method from a package's service provider. For example, let's use tags to define two publish groups in the boot method of a package service provider:
trans-unit.target: 您可能要分别发布软件包资产和资源组。例如，您可能希望允许您的用户发布程序包的配置文件，而不必被迫发布程序包的资产。您可以通过在软件包的服务提供者中调用 publishes 方法时对它们进行“标记”来实现此目的。例如，让我们使用标签在软件包服务提供者的 boot 方法中定义两个发布组：

trans-unit.source: You may wish to create a resources/views/emails directory to house all of your email templates; however, you are free to place them wherever you wish within your resources/views directory.
trans-unit.target: 您可能希望创建一个 resources/views/emails 目录以容纳所有电子邮件模板；但是，您可以将它们随意放置在 resources/views 目录中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: You may write information to the logs using the Logfacade. As previously mentioned, the logger provides the eight logging levels defined in the RFC 5424 specification: emergency, alert, critical, error, warning, notice, info and debug:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Log Facade将信息写入日志。如前所述，记录器提供了RFC 5424规范中定义的八个记录级别：紧急，警报，严重，错误，警告，通知，信息和调试：

trans-unit.source: You only need to place items in the read and write arrays if you wish to override the values from the main array. So, in this case, 192.168.1.1 will be used as the host for the "read" connection, while 192.168.1.2 will be used for the "write" connection. The database credentials, prefix, character set, and all other options in the main mysql array will be shared across both connections.
trans-unit.target: 你只需要在上面放置物品 read 和 write ，如果你想从主阵列覆盖值阵列。因此，在这种情况下， 192.168.1.1 将用作“读取”连接的主机，而 192.168.1.2 将用作“写入”连接的主机。主 mysql 阵列中的数据库凭据，前缀，字符集和所有其他选项将在两个连接之间共享。

trans-unit.source: You only need to place items in the read and write arrays if you wish to override the values from the main array. So, in this case, 192.168.1.1 will be used as the host for the "read" connection, while 192.168.1.3 will be used for the "write" connection. The database credentials, prefix, character set, and all other options in the main mysql array will be shared across both connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望覆盖主数组中的值，则只需要在 read 和 write 数组中放置项目即可。因此，在这种情况下， 192.168.1.1 将用作“读取”连接的主机，而 192.168.1.3 将用作“写入”连接的主机。主 mysql 阵列中的数据库凭据，前缀，字符集和所有其他选项将在两个连接之间共享。

trans-unit.source: You should also add the deleted_at column to your database table. The Laravel schema builder contains a helper method to create this column:
trans-unit.target: 您还应该将 deleted_at 列添加到数据库表中。Laravel模式构建器包含用于创建此列的帮助器方法：

trans-unit.source: You should also prevent the Telescope package from being auto-discovered by adding the following to your composer.json file:
trans-unit.target: 您还应该通过将以下内容添加到 composer.json 文件中来防止自动发现Telescope程序包：

trans-unit.source: You should always group orWhere calls in order to avoid unexpected behavior when global scopes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 您应该始终对 orWhere 调用进行分组，以避免在应用全局范围时发生意外行为。

trans-unit.source: You should always map individual projects to their own folder mapping instead of mapping your entire ~/code folder. When you map a folder the virtual machine must keep track of all disk IO for every file in the folder. This leads to performance issues if you have a large number of files in a folder.
trans-unit.target: 您应该始终将单个项目映射到其自己的文件夹映射，而不是映射整个 ~/code 文件夹。映射文件夹时，虚拟机必须跟踪该文件夹中每个文件的所有磁盘IO 。如果文件夹中有大量文件，则会导致性能问题。

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the __DIR__ and __FILE__ constants in your Blade views, since they will refer to the location of the cached, compiled view.
trans-unit.target: 您应该避免在Blade视图中使用 __DIR__ 和 __FILE__ 常量，因为它们将引用缓存的已编译视图的位置。

trans-unit.source: You should check out a tagged version of Homestead since the master branch may not always be stable. You can find the latest stable version on the GitHub Release Page. Alternatively, you may checkout the release branch which always contains the latest stable release:
trans-unit.target: 您应该签出带标签的Homestead版本，因为 master 分支可能并不总是稳定的。您可以在GitHub Release Page上找到最新的稳定版本。或者，您可以签出始终包含最新稳定发行版的 release 分支：

trans-unit.source: You should check out a tagged version of Homestead since the master branch may not always be stable. You can find the latest stable version on the GitHub Release Page:
trans-unit.target: 您应该签出带标签的Homestead版本，因为 master 分支可能并不总是稳定的。您可以在GitHub Release页面上找到最新的稳定版本：

trans-unit.source: You should commit your database schema file to source control so that other new developers on your team may quickly create your application's initial database structure.
trans-unit.target: 你应该将你的数据库模式文件提交到源代码控制中,这样你团队中的其他新开发人员就可以快速创建你的应用程序的初始数据库结构。

trans-unit.source: You should define the component's required data in its class constructor. All public properties on a component will automatically be made available to the component's view. It is not necessary to pass the data to the view from the component's render method:
trans-unit.target: 您应该在其类构造函数中定义组件的必需数据。组件上的所有公共属性将自动提供给组件视图。不必从组件的 render 方法将数据传递到视图：

trans-unit.source: You should ensure that any route that performs an action that should require recent password confirmation is assigned the password.confirm middleware. This middleware is included with the default installation of Laravel and will automatically store the user's intended destination in the session so that the user may be redirected to that location after confirming their password. After storing the user's intended destination in the session, the middleware will redirect the user to the password.confirmnamed route:
trans-unit.target: 您应确保为执行需要最近密码确认的操作的任何路由分配了 password.confirm 中间件。该中间件包含在Laravel的默认安装中，并且会自动在会话中存储用户的目标位置，以便在确认密码后将用户重定向到该位置。在将用户的预期目标存储在会话中之后，中间件会将用户重定向到 password.confirm 命名为route：

trans-unit.source: You should ensure that the CreateFreshApiToken middleware is the last middleware listed in your middleware stack.
trans-unit.target: 您应该确保 CreateFreshApiToken 中间件是中间件堆栈中列出的最后一个中间件。

trans-unit.source: You should ensure that the environments portion of your horizon configuration file contains an entry for each environment on which you plan to run Horizon.
trans-unit.target: 您应确保 horizon 配置文件的 environments 部分包含计划在其上运行Horizo​​n的每个环境的条目。

trans-unit.source: You should ensure that the value of stopwaitsecs is greater than the number of seconds consumed by your longest running job. Otherwise, Supervisor may kill the job before it is finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 您应确保 stopwaitsecs 的值大于运行时间最长的作业所消耗的秒数。否则，Supervisor可能会在完成处理之前取消该作业。

trans-unit.source: You should ensure that your application's CORS configuration is returning the Access-Control-Allow-Credentials header with a value of True by setting the supports_credentials option within your application's cors configuration file to true.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确保你的应用程序的CORS配置返回 Access-Control-Allow-Credentials ，值为头 True 通过设置 supports_credentials 你的应用程序中选择 cors 配置文件 true 。

trans-unit.source: You should ensure that your queue connection is set to redis in your queue configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 您应该确保在 queue 配置文件中将队列连接设置为 redis 。

trans-unit.source: You should ensure you change your APP_ENV environment variable to production in your production environment. Otherwise, your Telescope installation will be publicly available.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确保你改变你的 APP_ENV 环境变量 production 在生产环境中。否则，您的望远镜安装将公开可用。

trans-unit.source: You should never mount . (the current directory) when using Homestead. This causes Vagrant to not map the current folder to /vagrant and will break optional features and cause unexpected results while provisioning.
trans-unit.target: 您不应该挂载 . （当前目录）使用Homestead时。这将导致Vagrant无法将当前文件夹映射到 /vagrant ,并且会破坏可选功能并在配置时导致意外结果。

trans-unit.source: You should never pass any user controlled request input into the ignore method. Instead, you should only pass a system generated unique ID such as an auto-incrementing ID or UUID from an Eloquent model instance. Otherwise, your application will be vulnerable to an SQL injection attack.
trans-unit.target: 您永远不应将任何用户控制的请求输入传递​​给 ignore 方法。相反，您应该只传递系统生成的唯一ID，例如Eloquent模型实例中的自动递增ID或UUID。否则，您的应用程序将容易受到SQL注入攻击。

trans-unit.source: You should not define Closures in your configuration files. They can not be serialized correctly when users execute the config:cache Artisan command.
trans-unit.target: 您不应在配置文件中定义闭包。用户执行 config:cache Artisan命令时，无法正确序列化它们。

trans-unit.source: You should not define translation string keys that conflict with other translation file names. For example, translating __('Action') for the "NL" locale while a nl/action.php file exists but a nl.json file does not exist will result in the translator returning the contents of nl/action.php.
trans-unit.target: 您不应定义与其他翻译文件名冲突的翻译字符串键。例如，在存在 nl/action.php 文件但不存在 nl.json 文件的情况下为“ NL”语言环境翻译 __('Action') 会导致翻译器返回 nl/action.php 的内容。

trans-unit.source: You should not mock the Request facade. Instead, pass the input you desire into the HTTP helper methods such as get and post when running your test. Likewise, instead of mocking the Config facade, call the Config::set method in your tests.
trans-unit.target: 您不应嘲笑“ Request 外观。而是在运行测试时将所需的输入传递到HTTP帮助器方法中，例如 get 和 post 。同样，不要模拟 Config 外观，而是在测试中调用 Config::set 方法。

trans-unit.source: You should not use API tokens to authenticate your own first-party SPA. Instead, use Sanctum's built-in SPA authentication.
trans-unit.target: 您不应使用API​​令牌来验证自己的第一方SPA。相反，请使用Sanctum的内置SPA身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You should only use the @json directive to render existing variables as JSON. The Blade templating is based on regular expressions and attempts to pass a complex expression to the directive may cause unexpected failures.
trans-unit.target: 您只应使用 @json 指令将现有变量呈现为JSON。Blade模板基于正则表达式，尝试将复杂的表达式传递给指令可能会导致意外失败。

trans-unit.source: You should only use these non-standard ports when connecting to the databases from your host machine. You will use the default 3306 and 5432 ports in your Laravel database configuration file since Laravel is running within the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 从主机连接到数据库时，仅应使用这些非标准端口。由于Laravel 在虚拟机中运行，因此您将在Laravel数据库配置文件中使用默认的3306和5432端口。

trans-unit.source: You should typically run the php artisan config:cache command as part of your production deployment routine. The command should not be run during local development as configuration options will frequently need to be changed during the course of your application's development.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应该在生产部署例程中运行 php artisan config:cache 命令。该命令不应在本地开发期间运行，因为在应用程序开发过程中经常需要更改配置选项。

trans-unit.source: You should use the has method to determine if a value is present on the request. The has method returns true if the value is present on the request:
trans-unit.target: 您应该使用 has 方法来确定请求中是否存在值。的 has 方法返回 true 值是否存在于该请求：

trans-unit.source: You will also need the verification view stub. This view should be placed at resources/views/auth/verify.blade.php. You may obtain the view's contents on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 您还将需要验证视图存根。该视图应放置在 resources/views/auth/verify.blade.php 中。您可以在GitHub上获取视图的内容。

trans-unit.source: You will also need to configure an "Incoming Webhook" integration for your Slack team. This integration will provide you with a URL you may use when routing Slack notifications.
trans-unit.target: 您还需要为Slack团队配置“传入Webhook”集成。此集成将为您提供在路由Slack通知时可以使用的URL 。

trans-unit.source: You will also need to configure an "Incoming Webhook" integration for your Slack team. This integration will provide you with a URL you may use when routing Slack notifications.
trans-unit.target: 您还需要为Slack团队配置“传入Webhook”集成。此集成将为您提供在路由Slack通知时可以使用的URL 。

trans-unit.source: You will also need to define an error message for your custom rule. You can do so either using an inline custom message array or by adding an entry in the validation language file. This message should be placed in the first level of the array, not within the custom array, which is only for attribute-specific error messages:
trans-unit.target: 您还需要为自定义规则定义错误消息。您可以使用嵌入式自定义消息数组，也可以通过在验证语言文件中添加条目来实现。此消息应放置在数组的第一层，而不是在 custom 数组中，后者仅用于特定于属性的错误消息：

trans-unit.target: 您还需要修改您的 App\User 模型以实现 MustVerifyEmail 合同：

trans-unit.source: You will need to define routes to your controller methods:
trans-unit.target: 你需要定义控制器方法的路由。

trans-unit.source: You will often be generating URLs using the primary key of Eloquent models. For this reason, you may pass Eloquent models as parameter values. The route helper will automatically extract the model's primary key:
trans-unit.target: 您将经常使用Eloquent模型的主键生成URL 。因此，您可以将Eloquent模型作为参数值传递。该 route 助手会自动提取模型的主键：

trans-unit.source: Your .env file should not be committed to your application's source control, since each developer / server using your application could require a different environment configuration. Furthermore, this would be a security risk in the event an intruder gains access to your source control repository, since any sensitive credentials would get exposed.
trans-unit.target: 您的 .env 文件不应提交给应用程序的源代码管理，因为使用该应用程序的每个开发人员/服务器都可能需要不同的环境配置。此外，如果入侵者获得对您的源代码控制存储库的访问权限，这将带来安全隐患，因为任何敏感的凭据都会被公开。

trans-unit.source: Your custom session driver should implement the SessionHandlerInterface. This interface contains just a few simple methods we need to implement. A stubbed MongoDB implementation looks something like this:
trans-unit.target: 您的自定义会话驱动程序应实现 SessionHandlerInterface 。该接口仅包含一些我们需要实现的简单方法。一个残存的MongoDB实现看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Your event listeners may also type-hint any dependencies they need on their constructors. All event listeners are resolved via the Laravel service container, so dependencies will be injected automatically.
trans-unit.target: 您的事件侦听器还可以类型提示其对构造函数的任何依赖关系。所有事件侦听器都通过Laravel 服务容器解析，因此将自动注入依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Your event must use the Illuminate\Broadcasting\InteractsWithSockets trait in order to call the toOthers method.
trans-unit.target: 您的事件必须使用 Illuminate\Broadcasting\InteractsWithSockets 特性才能调用 toOthers 方法。

trans-unit.source: Your package may have assets such as JavaScript, CSS, and images. To publish these assets to the application's public directory, use the service provider's publishes method.
